languages.text: Суровый Веабос-6 стал землей испытания и закалки праведности. Кающиеся грешники и жаждущие подвига верующие стекались сюда, чтобы очиститься и укрепиться в его отравленной атмосфере. В зловещих чертогах крепости покаяния была учреждена Мрачная стража — орден крестоносцев, блюдущих чистоту Простора, славящихся упрямой стойкостью и внушающих многим опаску свирепым фанатизмом.

The harsh Vheabos VI became a land of trials capable of testing one's righteousness. The repentant and the zealous alike flocked there to be purified and toughened by its poisonous atmosphere. In the ominous halls of the Fortress of Penance, the Grim Guard was established, an order of crusaders who guarded the purity of the Expanse, renowned for their tenacity and feared for their unyielding fanaticism.
languages.original_text: Суровый Веабос-6 стал землей испытания и закалки праведности. Кающиеся грешники и жаждущие подвига верующие стекались сюда, чтобы очиститься и укрепиться в его отравленной атмосфере. В зловещих чертогах крепости покаяния была учреждена Мрачная стража — орден крестоносцев, блюдущих чистоту Простора, славящихся упрямой стойкостью и внушающих многим опаску свирепым фанатизмом.

traits.locale_text: The harsh Vheabos VI became a land of trials that temper righteousness. Repentant sinners and eager zealots flocked here to be purified and toughened by its poisonous atmosphere. In the ominous halls of the Fortress of Penance, the Grim Guard was established, an order of crusaders who guarded the purity of the Expanse, renowned for their tenacity and feared for their unyielding fanaticism.

In the ominous halls of the Fortress of Penance, the Grim Guard was established, an order of crusaders who guarded the purity of the Expanse, renowned for their tenacity and feared for their unyielding fanaticism.

In the ominous halls of the Fortress of Penance, the Grim Guard was established, an order of crusaders who guarded the purity of the Expanse, renowned for their tenacity and feared for their unyielding fanaticism.

In the ominous halls of the Fortress of Penance, the Grim Guard was established, an order of crusaders who guarded the purity of the Expanse, renowned for their tenacity and feared for their unyielding fanaticism.

The harsh Vheabos VI became a land of trials capable of testing one's righteousness. The repentant and the zealous alike flocked there to be purified and toughened by its poisonous atmosphere. In the ominous halls of the Fortress of Penance, the Grim Guard was established, an order of crusaders who guarded the purity of the Expanse, renowned for their tenacity and feared for their unyielding fanaticism.

languages.text: 严酷的维博斯六号星成为了正义之人的试炼之地，无数渴望忏悔的罪人与狂热的信徒涌向那里，渴望在有毒的空气中得到净化、磨练。在苦修要塞阴森的大厅之中，虔诚之人成立了严酷卫士团。这是一支由圣战士组成的队伍，负责守护科罗努斯扩区的纯洁。他们的坚韧意志名闻遐迩，毫不动摇的狂热态度更是令人畏惧不已。
languages.original_text: The harsh Vheabos VI became a land of trials capable of testing one's righteousness. The repentant and the zealous alike flocked there to be purified and toughened by its poisonous atmosphere. In the ominous halls of the Fortress of Penance, the Grim Guard was established, an order of crusaders who guarded the purity of the Expanse, renowned for their tenacity and feared for their unyielding fanaticism.

traits.locale_text: 严酷的维博斯六号星成为了正义之人的试炼之地，无数渴望忏悔的罪人与狂热的信徒涌向那里，渴望在有毒的空气中得到净化、磨练。在苦修要塞阴森的大厅之中，虔诚之人成立了严酷卫士团。这是一支由圣战士组成的队伍，负责守护科罗努斯扩区的纯洁。他们的坚韧意志名闻遐迩，毫不动摇的狂热态度更是令人畏惧不已。

languages.text: 荒涼としたヴィアボス・VIは人の公正さを試す試練の地となった。悔い改めた者も熱狂的な者も、その毒気に浄化され、強靭になるためにその地へと集まった。贖罪の砦の不気味なホールでは、グリムガードというエクスパンスの清廉さを守るための征戦士の騎士団が創設された。彼らはその頑強さで名高く、そして揺るぎない狂信っぷりで恐れられた。
languages.original_text: The harsh Vheabos VI became a land of trials capable of testing one's righteousness. The repentant and the zealous alike flocked there to be purified and toughened by its poisonous atmosphere. In the ominous halls of the Fortress of Penance, the Grim Guard was established, an order of crusaders who guarded the purity of the Expanse, renowned for their tenacity and feared for their unyielding fanaticism.

traits.locale_text: 荒涼としたヴィアボス・VIは人の公正さを試す試練の地となった。悔い改めた者も熱狂的な者も、その毒気に浄化され、強靭になるためにその地へと集まった。贖罪の砦の不気味なホールでは、グリムガードというエクスパンスの清廉さを守るための征戦士の騎士団が創設された。彼らはその頑強さで名高く、そして揺るぎない狂信っぷりで恐れられた。

languages.text: La rude Vhéabos-VI devint un endroit où mettre sa vertu à l'épreuve. Repentants et fanatiques y affluaient pour être purifiés et renforcés par son atmosphère toxique. Entre les murs oppressants de la Forteresse de la Pénitence fut installée la Garde Sinistre, un ordre de croisés défendant la pureté des Étendues, réputés pour leur ténacité et craints pour leur fanatisme inflexible.
languages.original_text: The harsh Vheabos VI became a land of trials capable of testing one's righteousness. The repentant and the zealous alike flocked there to be purified and toughened by its poisonous atmosphere. In the ominous halls of the Fortress of Penance, the Grim Guard was established, an order of crusaders who guarded the purity of the Expanse, renowned for their tenacity and feared for their unyielding fanaticism.

traits.locale_text: La rude Vhéabos-VI devint un endroit où mettre sa vertu à l'épreuve. Pêcheurs repentants et fanatiques zélés y affluaient pour être purifiés et renforcés par son atmosphère toxique. Entre les murs oppressants de la Forteresse de la Pénitence fut installée la Garde Sinistre, un ordre de croisés défendant la pureté des Étendues, réputés pour leur ténacité et craints pour leur fanatisme inflexible.

languages.text: El duro Vheabos VI se convirtió en una tierra de desafíos para poner a prueba la fe de los creyentes. Los arrepentidos y los fanáticos acudían en tropel para recibir la purificación y volverse más resistentes respirando su atmósfera venenosa. En los inquietantes salones de la Fortaleza de la Penitencia se estableció la Guardia Lúgubre, una orden de cruzados que defendía la pureza de la Extensión, afamada por su tenacidad y temida por su fanatismo inquebrantable.
languages.original_text: The harsh Vheabos VI became a land of trials capable of testing one's righteousness. The repentant and the zealous alike flocked there to be purified and toughened by its poisonous atmosphere. In the ominous halls of the Fortress of Penance, the Grim Guard was established, an order of crusaders who guarded the purity of the Expanse, renowned for their tenacity and feared for their unyielding fanaticism.

traits.locale_text: El duro Vheabos VI se convirtió en una tierra de desafíos para poner a prueba la fe de los creyentes. Los pecadores arrepentidos y los fanáticos acudían en tropel para recibir la purificación y volverse más resistentes respirando su atmósfera venenosa. En los inquietantes salones de la Fortaleza de la Penitencia se estableció la Guardia Lúgubre, una orden de cruzados que defendía la pureza de la Extensión, afamada por su tenacidad y temida por su fanatismo inquebrantable.

languages.text: Das strenge Vheabos-VI wurde zu einem Land voller Prüfungen der Rechtschaffenheit. Reuige Sünder und eifrige Fanatiker kamen gleichermaßen hierher, um durch die giftige Atmosphäre gereinigt und abgehärtet zu werden. In den bedrohlichen Hallen der Festung der Strafe wurde die Grimmige Wache gegründet, ein Orden von Kreuzrittern, die über die Reinheit der Ausdehnung wachten und bekannt waren für ihre Zähigkeit und gefürchtet für ihren unnachgiebigen Fanatismus.
languages.original_text: The harsh Vheabos VI became a land of trials capable of testing one's righteousness. The repentant and the zealous alike flocked there to be purified and toughened by its poisonous atmosphere. In the ominous halls of the Fortress of Penance, the Grim Guard was established, an order of crusaders who guarded the purity of the Expanse, renowned for their tenacity and feared for their unyielding fanaticism.

traits.locale_text: Das strenge Vheabos VI wurde zu einem Land voller Prüfungen der Rechtschaffenheit. Reuige Sünder und eifrige Fanatiker kamen hierher, um durch die giftige Atmosphäre gereinigt und abgehärtet zu werden. In den bedrohlichen Hallen der Festung der Strafe wurde die Grimmige Wache gegründet, ein Orden von Kreuzrittern, die über die Reinheit der Ausdehnung wachten und bekannt waren für ihre Zähigkeit und gefürchtet für ihren unnachgiebigen Fanatismus.

languages.text: Haşin Vheabos VI, insanın inancını sınamaya muktedir sınavların merkezine dönüştü. Hem tövbekârlar hem de bağnazlar, zehirli atmosfer tarafından arındırılıp katılaştırılmak adına gezegene akın etmeye başladı. Kefaret Hisarı'nın uğursuz salonlarında, Enginlik'in saflığını muhafaza etmekle mükellef olan Gaddar Muhafızlar düzeni kuruldu. Azimleriyle nam, sarsılmaz fanatiklikleriyle korku saldılar.
languages.original_text: The harsh Vheabos VI became a land of trials capable of testing one's righteousness. The repentant and the zealous alike flocked there to be purified and toughened by its poisonous atmosphere. In the ominous halls of the Fortress of Penance, the Grim Guard was established, an order of crusaders who guarded the purity of the Expanse, renowned for their tenacity and feared for their unyielding fanaticism.

traits.locale_text: Haşin gezegen Vheabos VI, kişinin inancını sınamaya muktedir sınavların merkezi hâline geldi. Tövbekârlar da, bağnazlar da, zehirli atmosfer tarafından arındırılmak ve katılaştırılmak adına oraya akın etmeye başladı. Kefaret Hisarı'nın uğursuz salonlarında, Enginlik'in saflığını muhafaza etmekle mükellef bir düzen olan Gaddar Muhafızlar kuruldu. Azimleriyle nam, sarsılmaz fanatiklikleriyle korku saldılar.
